content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking to schedule an electrical, plumbing, or HVAC service?
Hi, yes, I was going to schedule for some electrical work but, um, I think I don't need it after all. Sorry for bothering you.
No worries at all! If you ever need any electrical, plumbing, or HVAC services in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
reason: Customer changed mind; no service needed
